refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Return a substring of the source string. strsub runs at init time only.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: istart (optional, defaults to 0) -- start position in Ssrc, counting from 0. A negative value means the end of the string.
iend (optional, defaults to -1) -- end position in Ssrc, counting from 0. A negative value means the end of the string. If iend is less than istart, the output is reversed.
